title: Another Day, Another Fake “Scandal” (Ep 1342)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest media faux-outrage campaign against Trump. I show video evidence that this is another fake news event. I also address the shocking turn of events in the Spygate case as the lead investigator changes his story, again. 

News Picks:


Peter Strzok admits he got caught in a lie. 

Meet the hatchet man involved with the coming coup planning in the event Trump wins. 

Inside the privileged lives of the NY City rioters. 

Debunking another dopey “study” spreading coronavirus hysteria.

Is there a hidden Trump vote out there?

The NFL is being run by idiots.


Karl Rove’s piece about the Left’s Covid memory hole.
